data.Name: Malaaz
data.Bio: Malaaz is an Alternative rock band formed in 2014 by Mohamed Abdelrazik (Guitarist, Composer and lyrics writer) with his friend Amr Beshr (Lead Guitarist) who share the same passion for Rock and Metal music , they have already known each other since 2012 when Mohamed introduced him to an old band with the same background , the band main focus is to introduce alternative rock and hard rock into Arabic lyrics in an acceptable way which can be heard by anyone regardless of their musical background or taste. Read more on Last.fm
